session_id.Description: Specifies which session the data corresponds to

time_of_day.Description: Specifies when the session was conducted

cortisol_serum.Description: Concentration of cortisol obtained from serum

cortisol_saliva.Description: Concentration of cortisol obtained from serum

estradiol_serum.Description: Concentration of estrtadiol obtained from serum

free_testosterone_serum.Description: Concentration of free testosterone obtained from serum

total_testosterone_serum.Description: Concentration of total testosterone obtained from serum

total_testosterone_saliva.Description: Concentration of total testosterone obtained from saliva

poms_total.Description: Profile of Mood States total summary score

poms_tension.Description: Profile of Mood States tension subscore

poms_depression.Description: Profile of Mood States depression subscore

poms_anger.Description: Profile of Mood States anger subscore

poms_vigor.Description: Profile of Mood States vigor subscore

poms_fatigue.Description: Profile of Mood States fatigue subscore

poms_confusion.Description: Profile of Mood States confusion subscore

calories_burned.Description: Number of daily calories burned, recorded via Fitbit

steps.Description: Number of daily steps taken, recorded via Fitbit
